newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turkish police kill two in raid on Istanbul house.
newsitem.headline: Turkish police kill two in raid on Istanbul house.

text.p: Turkish police killed two people on Tuesday in an attack on a suspected guerrilla safe house in Istanbul, the state-run Anatolian news agency said.
The two died in an exchange of gunfire with the police in the western Istanbul district of Eyup, the agency reported.
It did not identify the dead. Police in the past have raided houses where they believe Kurdish separatist rebels or leftist guerrillas are sheltered.
